data.name: Silent World
data.detailed_description:
After working or studying for a long period, you couldn’t imagine how fancy it is to leave your seat and listen to relaxing music on your skateboard, especially at sunset or early morning.

Get rid of fatigue in Silent World! This is a simple 2D pixel game.
Here, being relaxed is the only purpose.

Players can switch different scenes from home page. In your game, you only need to use the direction key (WASD) to control your character to accelerate, decelerate, flip and jump.

Here are four different scenes, and new scenes will be continuously coming in the future.

Main features:
  • Leisure and relaxation
  • Slide simulation
  • Free content updates

data.short_description: Get rid of fatigue in Silent World! Listen to relaxing music and casual skateboarding in the sunset or early morning. It’s just a simple 2D pixel game.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7,32-bit
  • Processor: inter CPU Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:

  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
